description: Local pseudo-tools for meta-operations within the Copilot API

local.create_workflow.name: create_workflow
local.create_workflow.description: Create a detailed multi-step workflow plan for complex queries requiring multiple coordinated tools. Use this when the user's request needs a comprehensive plan outlined BEFORE execution. This will generate a workflow using the available tools and return the plan without executing anything. Choose this INSTEAD OF executing regular tools when: (1) The user explicitly asks for a 'plan', 'workflow', or 'steps', or (2) The task is complex enough that showing a coordinated approach first provides value. The workflow will be composed from the other available MCP tools. After calling this, the conversation will end with the workflow plan as the response.

query_summary.description: Brief summary of what the workflow should accomplish
